column4: ok... now I have a big problem. after installing the new drivers off of ati's site, rolling back, and using the ones in the ubuntu repo, my mouse pointer is corrupt (looks like a big ladder), and every time I log out, I am greeted with a blank screen. in addition to this, synaptic package managerand the restricted drivers manager both crash when I start them up. help?
it isnt that easy to roll stuff back.  How did you install the ati drivers from their site?>
get into recovery mode on boot with escape... then sudo if needed...   dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
vesa and a res at or below 1024 will get you back in
